news-item.title: In the Hot Seat: More budget hearings
news-item.author: Colby Itkowitz
news-item.text: Congress is back from recess, and lawmakers will resume their round of Fiscal 2015 budget and appropriations hearings. As debate over a U.S. aid package to Ukraine is hashed out on the House and Senate floors this week, Defense Department officials will testify about military spending at hearings in both chambers. This week will also feature appearances by cabinet secretaries such as Veterans Affairs Secretary Eric Shinseki and Interior Secretary Sally Jewell.
